subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki had 27 points and 13 rebounds, Jason Terry had several key baskets down the stretch, and the surging Mavericks beat Charlotte, 89-84, on Monday night.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki had 27 points and 13 rebounds, Jason Terry had several key baskets down the stretch, and the surging Mavericks beat Charlotte, 89-84, on Monday night.
